# Commands

# create_database

# Interactive

# Noninteractive

# Options

  • --driver (Driver/type, .e.g --driver=mysql)
  • --name (Name of database, .e.g. --name=my_database)
create_database \
    --driver=mysql \
    --name=my_database

# delete_database

# Noninteractive

# Options

  • --driver (Driver/type, .e.g --driver=mysql)
  • --name (Name of database, .e.g. --name=my_database)
delete_database \
    --driver=mysql \
    --name=my_database
